title: Canossa
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Buffet, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Italian cuisine restaurant at Saarland University at student-friendly prices. Vegans could get pizza bread (with olive oil, oregano, garlic), pizza with tomato sauce (ask to omit cheese), pizza vegetaria with veggies (ask to omit cheese), mixed salad, and pasta aglio e olio ai peperonchini. Pasta is from Barilla (vegan). Pizza dough is also vegan. Modern decor with large TV.
